catList: This module covers project life cycle and processes, project selection, project financing, project definition, project planning and scheduling, project execution and control, risk and resource planning, managing change through projects, managing Research and Development (R&D) projects, managing new product development (NPD) projects, commercialization of R&D and NPD projects, leadership and organization for project management.

Project life cycle and processes, project selection, project financing, project definition. Project planning and scheduling, project execution and control, risk and resource planning. Managing change through projects, managing Research and Development (R&D) projects, managing new product development (NPD) projects. Commercialization of R&D and NPD projects. Leadership and organization for project management.
